title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 6000.1 - Board office
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 6000.1 - Board office

State Regulations
(a) Correspondence address. All
correspondence or other written communications to the board or the
administrative officers of the board shall be addressed to the board's office
at New York State Board of Law Examiners, Building 3, Corporate Plaza, 254

Washington Avenue Extension, Albany, NY 12203-5195. (b) Website. The board
maintains a website at (www.nybarexam.org). Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
6000.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
